short_instructions.Course 4 Bee Params 5: Ejja nibdew mill-bidu - tista toħloq funzjoni ġdid imsejjħa "Ikseb nettaru 5" b'parametru direzzjonali?
short_instructions.Infinity_catch: Tistgha iggieghel il-Elsa ("attur 2") tilhaq il-Anna billi tuza l'Arrow Keys (Keys bil-vlegeg)?
short_instructions.Infinity_finale: Ohloq kull ma jogbok u qassamha!
short_instructions.Infinity_move_collide: Hiro huwa "attur 1". Mexxih lejn Baymax, u ghamel hoss meta jmissu.
short_instructions.Infinity_move_directions: Baymax huwa "attur 2". Zid Blokki "Mexxi" u mexxi il Baymax billi tuza l'Arrow Keys. Ghalu jmiss liz-zewg karattri l'ohra.
short_instructions.Infinity_move_right: Hiro huwa "attur 1".  Uża l-Blokk "Mexxi" biex tmexxi dritt il-Hiro biex imiss il-Baymax.
short_instructions.Infinity_repeat: Uza il-Blokka "Irrepeti ghal-Dejjem" biex tmexxi il Anna 400pixels il-fuq jew l-isfel.
short_instructions.Infinity_say: Ghamel il Anna tighd "Hello" billi tuza il-Blokka "Ghid" / "Say".
short_instructions.Infinity_shoot: Baymax huwa "attur 2". Gijel il-Baymax jitfa rokit il-Hiro.
short_instructions.Infinity_shoot_directions: Hiro huwa "attur 3". Gijel il-Hiro jitfla projectile lill-kull wiehed mil-4 karattri / atturi. Stenna sekonda bejn kull tefa'.
short_instructions.Infinity_touch_score: Ghamel il Anna tiehu puntegg kull darba li tmiss snowflake. Imbghad kilkkja "Run" u suqa biex tmiss kull snowflake.
short_instructions.New Gumball Project: Ohloq kull ma jogbok u qassamha!
short_instructions.New Ice Age Project: Ohloq kull ma jogbok u qassamha!
short_instructions.New Infinity Project: Ohloq kull ma jogbok u qassamha!
short_instructions.frozen circle: Ċirku huwa forma speċjali. Tistgħa tahseb f'numru biex jissostitwixxi (?) biex tpingi cirku?
short_instructions.frozen circle function: Uża l-Blokk ġdid "Oħloq ċirku" biex toħloq 10 ċrieki jirkbu fuq xulxin. Tinsiex taqbeż il-quddiem bejn cirku u iehor.
short_instructions.frozen circle function in circle: Issa ejja noħloqu 20 ċirku li jirkbu fuq xulxin, dawwar 18 il-grad bejn kull ċirku.
short_instructions.frozen circle function with parameter:
Hawn huwa Blokk "Oħloq ċirku" 
li jistgħA jagħmEL ċrieki ta ' daqsijiet differenti. Tista ' tuża dan il-blokk biex tohloq ċirku żgħir ta ' daqs 5 u ċirku ikbar ta ' daqs 10?
short_instructions.frozen cross rotate: Issa ejja nipprovaw nirrepetu 10 darbiet. Kemm għandek bżonn idawwar gradi bejn kull linja?
short_instructions.frozen cross rotate dense: Ejja nirrepetu 90 darba! Kemm il darba 90 jithol f'360? Hjiel: Huwa numru verament zghir.
short_instructions.frozen diamond snowflake: Issa, ejja noħolqu snowflake ġdida bl-użu ta ' l-Blokk Irrepeti biex nirrepetu l-parallelogram 10 darbiet, u induru lejn il-lemin b'36 grad bejn kull wieħed.
short_instructions.frozen freeplay: Inti sirt ufficjalment Artist Mustaccun! Ohloq art tax-xitwa magika.
short_instructions.frozen line: Hello!  Jien Elsa minn Arendelle. Ghinni npingi linja.
short_instructions.frozen perpendicular: Issa ejja naraw jekk jirnexxilnix noholqu zewg linji li qeghdin 90 grad min xulxin. Ha jkollok bzonn tuza il Blokka "Turn" / "Dawwar" w anke il Blokka "Mexxi"/"Move".
short_instructions.frozen snowflake branch: Prova uza il blokka "Create a snowflake branch" biex tohloq tlett ferghat, hekk tibda tidher qisha borra/snowflake.
short_instructions.frozen snowflake full: Issa ejja nirrepetu kollox 8 darbiet, ha naghmlu snowflake sabiha.
short_instructions.frozen snowflower: Forom ta snowflakes kumplikati jistghu jigu krejati billi tiza ftit forom semplici. Tistgha tahmel forma billi tirripeti 5 criki ta qis 5 u 5 ohra ta qis 10?
short_instructions.frozen square iterative: Jidher li wasalna nofs triq biex naghmlu kaxxa. Ejja nitfghu 4 linji flimkien biex noholqu kaxxa.
short_instructions.frozen square loop: Hello, Jien Anna ta Arendelle!, Ejja noholqu kaxxa billi nuzaw il-Blokka "Irrepeti" / "Repeat", b'hekk nuzaw inqas blokki. Kemm il darba (???)  il-Blokka "Irrepeti" trid tirrepeti il Blokkok l'ohra ta go fijha biex taghmel kaxxa?
short_instructions.frozen square loop 3x: Ejja nikrejaw tlett kaxxi, induru wara kull kaxxa. Kunu certi li iddawru b'120 grad qabel ma tikrejaw kull kaxxa.
short_instructions.frozen square snowflake: Tistgha tohloq snowflake billi tuza il Blokka "Irrepeti" / "Repeat" bix taghmel kaxxa 10 darbiet, u il Blokka "Dawwar" / "Turn" biex idawwar kull kaxxa 36 grad?
